title: Wilson's Creek National Battlefield: Brochures
body: Brochures       A PDF version of the battlefield's brochure map may be found by clicking here.  A JPEG version of the battlefield's recreational use guide, showing the trail network, may be found by clicking here. Hard copies of the entire brochure can be requested by clicking here. Be sure to include all pertinent information (name and regular mailing address) in the text of your message.
